long.am,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,kn,ml,mr,m:
ğŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸ Take Control of Your Browsing Privacy with Ease
"Incognitab" extension allows you to open any webpage in incognito mode, keeping your activity private and deleting URLs from history with a single click. Whether you need to open a tab in incognito or open an incognito window, this extension makes it effortless to browse without leaving any traces such as cookies, cached files, or browsing history. Perfect for situations where privacy is essential or when youâ€™re troubleshooting web issues caused by stored data or cookies.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
ğŸ–±ï¸ Right-Click to Open in Incognito: Quickly right-click anywhere on a webpage and select "Open in Incognito Mode" to open the current tab in an incognito window. This ensures no old data or cookies interfere with your browsing, and your history is automatically cleared.
ğŸ–²ï¸ Toolbar Icon for Fast Access: Need to switch to incognito quickly? Click the toolbar icon, and instantly open the active tab in incognito mode without any extra steps. No need to navigate settingsâ€”just one click for incognito browsing.
ğŸ’¾ Delete URL from History: When you open a window in incognito using this extension, the regular browsing history is automatically cleared for that URL. Your online footprint is minimized, offering enhanced privacy.

ğŸŒŸ Why Use This Extension:
- Privacy: Use this extension to open incognito tabs for private browsing when dealing with sensitive information or browsing personal accounts.
- Troubleshooting: IT experts recommend incognito mode to bypass web issues like outdated cookies or cached files. Use the extension to get a fresh, clean version of any website.
- No History Left Behind: This extension doesnâ€™t just open tabs in incognito mode - it also ensures that the URL is immediately removed from your regular browsing history, ensuring that no trace is left behind.

ğŸ› ï¸ How to Use It:
1ï¸âƒ£ Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2ï¸âƒ£ Right-click on any webpage and select "Open in Incognito Mode" to instantly open the page in a private window.
3ï¸âƒ£ Alternatively, click the toolbar icon to open the active tab in incognito mode, ensuring no history or data is saved.
4ï¸âƒ£ Delete URL from History: The extension automatically removes the URL from your regular browsing history when you open the page in incognito, making sure your private browsing remains truly private.

ğŸ¤” Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
Q: How do I open a tab in incognito mode using this extension?
A: You can either right-click on any webpage and select "Open in Incognito Mode" or click the extension's toolbar icon to instantly open the active tab in an incognito window.

Q: Does this extension delete URLs from my browsing history?
A: Yes, when you open a window in incognito mode using this extension, the URL is automatically deleted from your regular browsing history, ensuring maximum privacy.

Q: Why should I use this extension instead of the standard incognito mode?
A: This extension simplifies the process by allowing you to quickly open incognito tabs directly from the page youâ€™re on, without navigating through menus. It also has the added benefit of deleting URLs from your history automatically.

Q: Can I use this extension to open internal browser pages like settings in incognito?
A: No, internal pages like chrome:// or about:// cannot be opened in incognito mode for security reasons. When an internal page is detected, the extension will redirect to google.com in incognito.

Q: Is there a keyboard shortcut for opening a tab in incognito mode?
A: Currently, this extension supports right-click and toolbar icon clicks for quickly opening incognito windows. Keyboard shortcuts are not yet implemented.

Q: Can I customize the behavior of the extension?
A: At present, the extension automatically deletes URLs from history and opens incognito windows as described. Additional customization options are planned for future updates.

long.fil:
ğŸ© Magkaroon ng kontrol sa iyong privacy sa pag-browse nang madali. Ang "Open Incognito Tab" extension ay nagpapahintulot sa iyo na mabilis na magbukas ng anumang webpage sa incognito mode, tiyaking mananatiling pribado at walang bakas tulad ng cookies o history ang iyong aktibidad. Perpekto ito sa mga sitwasyon kung saan mahalaga ang privacy, o kung may mga problema sa pag-browse na dulot ng caching at nakaimbak na data.

ğŸ› Mga Tampok na Mahalaga:
ğŸ–±ï¸ Right-Click para sa Incognito: Madali lang mag-right-click kahit saan sa isang webpage at piliin ang "Open in Incognito Mode." Agad na mag-reload ang pahina sa isang pribadong window upang tiyaking walang lumang data, cookies, o cached files na makakaapekto sa iyong pag-browse.
ğŸ–²ï¸ Toolbar Icon: Gusto mo bang mag-switch sa incognito nang mabilis? I-click lang ang icon ng extension sa toolbar ng iyong browser, at ang kasalukuyang tab ay magbubukas sa isang incognito windowâ€”pinapayagan kang magpatuloy sa pag-browse nang walang iniwang bakas.
ğŸ’¡ Bakit Mahalaga ang Extension na Ito: Mahalaga ang pag-browse sa incognito mode kapag kailangan mo ng mas maraming privacyâ€”kahit na nagre-research ka ng sensitibong mga paksa, nagpapamahala ng personal na impormasyon, o nag-o-online shopping. Madalas na inirerekomenda ng mga IT team ang paggamit ng incognito mode upang maiwasan ang mga karaniwang problema sa web tulad ng cached files o cookies na maaaring magdulot ng pagkabigo ng mga website. Kapag hindi naglo-load nang tama ang iyong pahina, o kailangan mong makita ang isang malinis na bersyon ng isang website na walang nakaimbak na data, ang incognito mode ay maaaring maging perpektong solusyon.

ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ Paano Gamitin:
1ï¸âƒ£ Mag-install ng extension mula sa Chrome Web Store.
2ï¸âƒ£ Mag-right-click sa anumang webpage at piliin ang "Open in Incognito Mode" upang agad na magbukas ng kasalukuyang pahina sa isang pribadong window.
3ï¸âƒ£ Kung gusto mo, i-click ang icon ng extension sa iyong toolbar upang magbukas ng aktibong tab sa isang incognito window nang walang karagdagang hakbang.

ğŸ”± Sa pag-privacy o pag-troubleshoot, ang "Open Incognito Tab" ay nagpapahintulot sa iyo na mag-navigate sa web nang may mas kaunting bakas at mas kaunting sakit ng ulo, tumutulong sa iyo na mag-access ng sariwang nilalaman at maiwasan ang mga conflict sa data.

ğŸ© Ambil kendali atas privasi penjelajahan Anda dengan mudah. Ekstensi "Open Incognito Tab" memungkinkan Anda untuk dengan cepat membuka halaman web apa pun dalam mode incognito, memastikan aktivitas Anda tetap pribadi dan bebas dari jejak seperti cookie atau riwayat. Sempurna untuk situasi di mana privasi penting, atau ketika menyelesaikan masalah web yang disebabkan oleh caching dan data yang disimpan.

ğŸ› Fitur Utama:
ğŸ–±ï¸ Klik Kanan untuk Incognito: Cukup klik kanan di mana saja pada halaman web dan pilih "Buka dalam Mode Incognito." Secara instan halaman akan dimuat ulang dalam jendela pribadi untuk memastikan tidak ada data lama, cookie, atau file yang di-cache mengganggu pengalaman penjelajahan Anda.
ğŸ–²ï¸ Ikon Toolbar: Ingin beralih ke incognito dengan cepat? Cukup klik ikon ekstensi di toolbar browser Anda, dan tab aktif akan terbuka di jendela incognito - memungkinkan Anda untuk melanjutkan penjelajahan tanpa meninggalkan jejak.
ğŸ’¡ Mengapa Ekstensi Ini Berguna: Menjelajah dalam mode incognito sangat penting ketika Anda membutuhkan lebih banyak privasi - baik itu saat melakukan penelitian tentang topik sensitif, mengelola informasi pribadi, atau berbelanja online. Tim IT sering merekomendasikan penggunaan mode incognito untuk menghindari masalah umum di web seperti file yang di-cache atau cookie yang dapat menyebabkan situs web tidak berfungsi. Ketika halaman Anda tidak dimuat dengan benar, atau Anda perlu melihat versi bersih dari sebuah situs web tanpa data yang disimpan, mode incognito dapat menjadi solusi yang sempurna.

ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ Cara Menggunakannya:
1ï¸âƒ£ Pasang ekstensi dari Chrome Web Store.
2ï¸âƒ£ Klik kanan pada halaman web apa pun dan pilih "Buka dalam Mode Incognito" untuk langsung membuka halaman saat ini dalam jendela pribadi.
3ï¸âƒ£ Atau, klik ikon ekstensi di toolbar Anda untuk membuka tab aktif dalam jendela incognito tanpa langkah tambahan.

ğŸ”± Baik untuk privasi maupun penyelesaian masalah, "Open Incognito Tab" memastikan Anda dapat menjelajahi web dengan lebih sedikit jejak dan lebih sedikit masalah, membantu Anda mengakses konten segar dan menghindari konflik data.
long.it:
ğŸ© Prendi il controllo della tua privacy di navigazione con facilitÃ . L'estensione "Open Incognito Tab" ti consente di aprire rapidamente qualsiasi pagina web in modalitÃ  incognito, garantendo che la tua attivitÃ  rimanga privata e libera da tracce come cookie o cronologia. Perfetto per situazioni in cui la privacy Ã¨ importante, o quando si risolvono problemi web causati dalla memorizzazione nella cache e dai dati archiviati.

ğŸ› Caratteristiche principali:
ğŸ–±ï¸ Clic destro per Incognito: Basta fare clic con il pulsante destro del mouse ovunque su una pagina web e scegliere "Apri in modalitÃ  incognito". La pagina verrÃ  immediatamente ricaricata in una finestra privata per assicurarti che non ci siano dati, cookie o file memorizzati che interferiscano con la tua esperienza di navigazione.
ğŸ–²ï¸ Icona nella barra degli strumenti: Vuoi passare rapidamente alla modalitÃ  incognito? Basta fare clic sull'icona dell'estensione nella barra degli strumenti del tuo browser e la scheda attiva verrÃ  aperta in una finestra incognito, consentendoti di continuare a navigare senza lasciare tracce.
ğŸ’¡ PerchÃ© questa estensione Ã¨ utile: Navigare in modalitÃ  incognito Ã¨ essenziale quando hai bisogno di maggiore privacy, che tu stia facendo ricerche su argomenti sensibili, gestendo informazioni personali o facendo acquisti online. I team IT spesso consigliano di utilizzare la modalitÃ  incognito per bypassare problemi comuni come file memorizzati nella cache o cookie che possono causare malfunzionamenti dei siti web. Quando la tua pagina non si carica correttamente o hai bisogno di vedere una versione pulita di un sito web senza dati archiviati, la modalitÃ  incognito puÃ² essere la soluzione perfetta.

ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ Come usarlo:
1ï¸âƒ£ Installa l'estensione dal Chrome Web Store.
2ï¸âƒ£ Fai clic con il pulsante destro del mouse su qualsiasi pagina web e seleziona "Apri in modalitÃ  incognito" per aprire immediatamente la pagina corrente in una finestra privata.
3ï¸âƒ£ In alternativa, fai clic sull'icona dell'estensione nella barra degli strumenti per aprire la scheda attiva in una finestra incognito senza passaggi aggiuntivi.

ğŸ”± Che tu voglia maggior privacy o risolvere problemi, "Open Incognito Tab" ti consente di navigare sul web con meno tracce e meno mal di testa, aiutandoti ad accedere a contenuti freschi e ad evitare conflitti di dati.

ğŸ© Take control of your browsing privacy with ease. The "Open Incognito Tab" extension allows you to swiftly open any webpage in incognito mode, ensuring your activity remains private and free from any traces like cookies or history. Perfect for situations when privacy matters, or when troubleshooting web issues caused by caching and stored data.

ğŸ› Key Features:
ğŸ–±ï¸ Right-Click for Incognito: Simply right-click anywhere on a webpage and choose "Open in Incognito Mode." Instantly reload the page in a private window to ensure no old data, cookies, or cached files interfere with your browsing experience.
ğŸ–²ï¸ Toolbar Icon: Want to switch to incognito quickly? Just click the extension icon in your browser's toolbar, and the current tab will open in an incognito windowâ€”allowing you to continue browsing without leaving a trace.
ğŸ’¡ Why This Extension is Useful: Browsing in incognito mode is essential when you need more privacyâ€”whether youâ€™re researching sensitive topics, managing personal information, or shopping online. IT teams often recommend using incognito mode to bypass common web issues like cached files or cookies that can cause websites to malfunction. When your page isnâ€™t loading correctly, or you need to see a clean version of a website without stored data, incognito mode can be the perfect solution.

ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ How to Use It:
1ï¸âƒ£ Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2ï¸âƒ£ Right-click on any webpage and select "Open in Incognito Mode" to instantly open the current page in a private window.
3ï¸âƒ£ Alternatively, click the extension icon in your toolbar to open the active tab in an incognito window without extra steps.

ğŸ”± Whether for privacy or troubleshooting, "Open Incognito Tab" ensures you can navigate the web with fewer traces and fewer headaches, helping you access fresh content and avoid data conflicts.
